Detailed Description

Convenience class for implementing an action that activates a view tool.

This class is provided for developers who write view tools to easily create an action that will activate the view tool. Simply subclass DzViewToolAction, and provide your viewtool class name along with any of the optional arguments. Then add the class to the classes exported by your plug-in with DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_FACTORY().

DzViewToolAction subclasses are automatically added to the main menu under 'Tools' as well as the View Tools Toolbar.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzViewToolAction::DzViewToolAction ( const char *  toolClassName  )  [protected]

Creates a new DzViewToolAction. To create a new view tool action, you must subclass DzViewToolAction, and provide the name of the DzViewTool subclass that is controlled by the action.

Parameters:
toolClassName The name of the DzViewTool subclass that is activated by this action.

void DzViewToolAction::toggleAction ( bool  onOff  )  [protected, virtual]

This reimplementation sets the tool for this action to be the current viewport tool.
